types.html:
parler de corde dans la maison d'un pendu

  1. (figuratively) to put one's foot in one's mouth, to be like a bull in a china shop, to hit the wrong note (to broach a sensitive topic in an inappropriate setting, where that topic is taboo; to be completely tactless)

See also

[edit]
  • mettre les pieds dans le plat
  • comme un éléphant dans un magasin de porcelaine
trans: to put one's foot in one's mouth, to be like a bull in a china shop, to hit the wrong note

title: parler de corde dans la maison d'un pendu
ipas: /paʁ.le d(ə) kɔʁ.d(ə) dɑ̃ la mɛ.zɔ̃ d‿œ̃ pɑ̃.dy/
/paʁ.le d(ə) kɔʁ.d(ə) dɑ̃ la me.zɔ̃ d‿œ̃ pɑ̃.dy/
